panel.label: Texture
panel.name: Texture
panel.panel.string: When multiple faces are copied, the target object must have the same number of faces selected.
When all faces of an object are copied, the target object must have the same number of faces.
One or more textures not found in inventory.

texture_picker.name: pbr_control
texture_picker.label: Material
texture_picker.tool_tip: Click to choose a pbr material

texture_picker.name: base_color_picker
texture_picker.label: Base Color
texture_picker.tool_tip: Click to choose the base color map (Albedo)

color_swatch.name: base_color_tint_picker
color_swatch.label: Tint
color_swatch.tool_tip: Click to choose the base color tint

button.name: btn_select_same_gltf
button.tool_tip: Select all faces with the same GLTF material as this one

texture_picker.name: normal_map_picker
texture_picker.label: Normal
texture_picker.tool_tip: Click to choose the normal map

texture_picker.name: emissive_map_picker
texture_picker.label: Emissive
texture_picker.tool_tip: Click to choose the emission map

color_swatch.name: emissive_color_tint_picker
color_swatch.label: Tint
color_swatch.tool_tip: Click to choose the emissive color tint

texture_picker.name: metallic_map_picker
texture_picker.label: (O)RM
texture_picker.tool_tip: Click to choose the metallic-roughness map, which may contain optional occlusion channel

button.name: btn_select_same_diff
button.tool_tip: Select all faces with the same diffuse texture as this one

button.name: btn_select_same_norm
button.tool_tip: Select all faces with the same normal map as this one

button.name: btn_select_same_spec
button.tool_tip: Select all faces with the same specular map as this one

panel.label: Media
panel.name: panel_material_type_media
panel.text: URL of chosen media, if any, goes here

check_box.label: Align planar faces
check_box.name: checkbox planar align
check_box.tool_tip: Align textures on all selected faces with the last selected face. Requires Planar texture mapping.
